name: You Must Continue
description:
a short psychological horror based on a famous experiment

Thank you for taking part in this research study. You have been randomly selected to play the role of the TEACHER. When the STUDENT fails to correctly identify a word pair, you will be instructed to deliver a mild electric shock using the console in front of you. Please follow my instructions and deliver electric shocks only when commanded. Are you ready to begin?

How to Run:
  • Web Browser: Click to run. F11 to fullscreen
  • Windows/Mac/Linux: Download and unzip the file. Run the executable.
  • Mobile: Download and install the apk file. You may need to enable unknown sources on your device.
Controls:
  • Web/Windows/Mac/Linux:
    • Mouse to look around.
    • Click to interact and advance dialogue
    • [0] and [1] keys to select dialogue options
    • [Esc] to pause
  • Mobile:
    • Tap and drag to look around
    • to interact and advance dialogue
    • and to select dialogue options
    • to pause
Content Warnings:
  • Simulated bodily harm (and reaction to bodily harm)
  • Electric shock/electrocution
  • Medical & psychological experimentation
  • Themes of authoritarianism and coercion
  • Loud noises
  • Simulated enclosed space
